attributes.action: Remove John Bercow from speaker of the house for breaking his duty.
attributes.additional_details:
an impartial speaker cannot do this the Commons Speaker said "nobody is going to get away as far as I am concerned" with stopping MPs taking action to avoid the scenario.
He must be made to stand down as he has clearly crossing the line is against what his duty is.
attributes.background:
John Bercow vows to stop PM from closing Commons to force no deal
The Commons Speaker slams the suggestion Boris Johnson could shut parliament, vowing to "fight it with every bone in my body".
